name: Plain Cheese
description: The minimalist. Quiet confidence, always dependable.

name: All Pepperoni
description: Straightforward and bold. Doesn’t overthink it, gets things done.

name: Margherita
description: Elegant and artsy. Values aesthetics and chill vibes.

name: White
description: Low-key intellectual. Likes candlelight, books, and chill playlists.

name: Supreme
description: The leader. Balanced, experienced, always has opinions.

name: Mexican Pizza
description: Spicy, energetic, party starter. Probably DJ’ed a house party.

name: BBQ Chicken
description: Cool and confident with just a bit of a wild streak.

name: KBBQ Bulgogi + Sweet Potato Crust
description: Trendsetter. Eats fusion before it’s cool.

name: Anchovy Pizza
description: Hot take personified. Either a genius or a menace.

name: Meat Lover’s
description: Gym bro energy. Possibly owns an air fryer and uses it aggressively.

name: Mac & Cheese Pizza
description: Comfort gremlin. Brings a blanket everywhere.

name: Chocolate Oreo Pizza
description: Sugar-fueled chaos goblin. Posts memes at 3 AM.

name: Apple Pie
description: Cottagecore but unhinged. Bakes and starts cults.

name: Cheesecake
description: Sweet but dramatic. Definitely has a Finsta.

name: Veggie Lover’s
description: Eco-conscious. Probably knows their zodiac and your rising sign.

name: Pesto
description: Quirky and underrated. Likes rainy days and funky socks.

name: Ricotta Garlic
description: Sensual introvert. Talks slow, thinks deep, cooks good pasta.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Unexpectedly fancy. Could be a secret millionaire or just pretends really well.

name: Hawaiian
description: The sweet rebel. Hated by many, loved by the brave.
